statement.p: In 53.13 of the last 32 days it rained. How many days did it not rain? days

solution.p: We recall that a percent as a decimal is part/whole. Here that is \displaystyle\frac{{P}}{{32}}={0.5313}. We solve for P by multiplying by \displaystyle{32}. \displaystyle{P}={0.5313}\cdot{32}={17.0016}. This is the number of days that it rained. We want the non-rainy days which is 32-17.0016=14.9984 We round that as requested to 15.
